job.title: je
job.description:
{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-20T22:54:33.000Z", "description": "

Primary Responsibilities: 

\u00b7      Responsible for Fullstack Application Development Management- .Net for the Managed Care LOB

\u00b7      Keep the current/upcoming projects on track/resourced appropriately. Manage, develop, lead personnel and provide documentation related to performance and delivery.

\u00b7      Cover all primary development activity across all technology functions that ensure we deliver code with high quality for our applications, products and services and to understand customer needs and to develop product roadmaps. These roles include, but are not limited to analysis, design, coding, engineering, testing, debugging, standards, methods, tools analysis, documentation, research and development, maintenance, new development, operations and delivery

\u00b7      Evaluate new tools, new techniques, strategies; Automation of common tasks; build of common utilities to drive organizational efficiency with a passion around technology and solutions and influence of thought and leadership on future capabilities and opportunities to apply technology in new and innovative ways

Required Qualifications: 

\u00b7      7+ years\u2019 experience working with .NET Technologies: C#, ASP.NET and MVC

\u00b7      SQL experience: querying, table design, DB administration, stored procedures, etc.

\u00b7      Continuous Integration/Continuous Delivery

\u00b7      JavaScript, HTML, HTTP, CSS, and JQuery 

\u00b7      Experience implementing API Webservices

\u00b7      Proven experience managing the full development life cycle including discovery, implementation, and delivery (on time and on budget)

\u00b7      Design and estimate leadership

Preferred Qualifications: 

\u00b7      Agile

\u00b7      Facets

\u00b7      CSS framework such as Bootstrap

\u00b7      Javascript frameworks such as Angular, Backbone, or React/Redux

\u00b7      MSBuild, Jenkins, JPAC, Containers

\u00b7      Test Driven Delivery (TDD)

\u00b7      TFS, Git, Powershell

\u00b7      MS Visual Studio

 

 

 

Information and technology have amazing power to transform the health care industry and improve people's lives. This is where it's happening. This is where you'll help solve the problems that have never been solved. We're freeing information so it can be used safely and securely wherever it's needed. We're creating the very best ideas that can most easily be put into action to help our clients improve the quality of care and lower costs for millions. This is where the best and the brightest work together to make positive change a reality. This is the place to do your life's best work.(sm)

 

Eight Eleven Group provides equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, age, sex, citizenship, disability, genetic information, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, marital status, amnesty or status as a covered veteran in accordance with applicable federal, state, and local laws.
